summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) form used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being interviewed voluntarily as part of an investigation into job performance failure and security failure. The form includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, acknowledging the voluntary nature of the interview.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: OIG Special Agent conducting the interview
persons.context: The OIG Special Agent is the investigator who would be conducting the voluntary interview with an employee regarding a job performance and security failure investigation.

persons.name: Witness
persons.role: Witness to the signing of the form
persons.context: A witness is present to observe the signing of the waiver form by the employee, as indicated by the signature and name fields for a witness.

keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The investigation pertains to 'Job performance failure and security failure.'
The interview is voluntary, and the employee is assured no disciplinary action will be taken if they choose not to answer questions.
Any statement provided may be used as evidence in future criminal or agency disciplinary proceedings.
The form includes a waiver for the employee to sign, confirming no coercion was used.
